info.title: PoliteMail
info.description: Measure results with powerful email metrics, including opens, read-time and click through rates plus valuable analytics to help you gain the insights you need to improve your communications.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Selects which properties to include in the response.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Returns only the first n results.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Includes a count of the matching results in the response.

post.description: This action allows you to add contacts to a PoliteMail list by email address.
This action allows you to remove contacts from a PoliteMail list by email address.
This action allows you to create a list.
This action allows you to create a template.
This allows you to send a tracked message using PoliteMail.

Campaign.title: Select Campaign
Campaign.description: Specify the campaign this message is a part of

To.description: Specify email addresses separated by semicolons

Subject.description: Specify the subject of the mail

Body.description: Specify the body of the mail

CC.description: Specify email addresses separated by semicolons

BCC.description: Specify email addresses separated by semicolons

SendMode.title: Send Mode
SendMode.description: Specify Send Mode for this message: 1-individual, 2-Anonymous, 3-Aggregate Modes
